body: Hm, what version of hyper? I just tried that URL using https://github.com/hyperium/hyper/blob/master/examples/client.rs and it worked for me.
I believe this is a bug in the resizing of the buffer. It seems to zero the entire thing, not just the new part.

issue.title: fix(buffer): fix incorrect resizing of BufReader
Err value: Version when unwrapping a response
